WRITING.TEXT: It will have to be 23 gold by the end of the day.
I'm German, consider myself fairly educated on EU politics and could rattle off quite a number of MEPs. Never heard of her.
We've got slightly different terms, it's alright.

I have *never* seen that definition of "(painting) study" here. A study in art, as I understand it, is a preparatory work in general, be it a copy or not. Overlaps with "sketch". Of course this can be a study, but first of all, it's a "painting copy".
